trigger_description: This trigger fires every time your dishwasher is turned off.
This trigger fires every time your dishwasher cycle starts.
This trigger fires every time the salt supply is running low.
This trigger fires every time your dishwasher door has been closed.
This trigger fires every time your dishwasher cycle is complete.
This trigger fires every time the rinse aid supply is running low.
This trigger fires every time your dishwasher is turned on.
This trigger fires every time your dishwasher door has been opened.
